name: A Talk With The Reaper
description:
Make sure you play fullscreen as it won't work otherwise!

This was made for the Bytefest 2021 Game Jam and all art and programming was done by me (except for the dialogue system which I found on the Unity asset store and is called the "Dialogue Editor").

I submitted this game early just because I was getting sick of working on it so that's why the ending is abrupt :)

 I used the retro sound effect asset for the music

Just to be clear! I am not sexist, I just tried to make the main character as unlikable as possible! Though I am a bit worried about the Jam because there was a "no offensive content rule" for the games so I understand if it gets taken off the jam page :)

Just to be safe, if you are under 13 you probably shouldn't play this game! (But go ahead if you really want to for some reason)
